dataquery.name: WorkingQueue
dataquery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ACCOUNT_NUM AS MAINACCOUNT_NUM FROM TAXABLE_OBJECT

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(APPRAISAL_YR)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(APPRAISAL_YR, '|') END AS 'APPRAISAL_YR', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CASE WHEN OWNER_NAME1 LIKE '%&' THEN OWNER_NAME1 + ' ' + OWNER_ADDRESS_LINE1 ELSE OWNER_NAME1 END)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CASE WHEN OWNER_NAME1 LIKE '%&' THEN OWNER_NAME1 + ' ' + OWNER_ADDRESS_LINE1 ELSE OWNER_NAME1 END, '|') END AS 'OWNER_NAME1', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_ADDRESS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_ADDRESS, '|') END AS 'OWNER_ADDRESS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_CITY)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_CITY, '|') END AS 'OWNER_CITY', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_STATE)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_STATE, '|') END AS 'OWNER_STATE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_ZIPCODE)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_ZIPCODE, '|') END AS 'OWNER_ZIPCODE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_COUNTRY)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_COUNTRY, '|') END AS 'OWNER_COUNTRY', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(MAPSCO)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(MAPSCO, '|') END AS 'MAPSCO', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NBHD_CD)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NBHD_CD, '|') END AS 'NBHD_CD', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(PROPERTY_ADDRESS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PROPERTY_ADDRESS, '|') END AS 'PROPERTY_ADDRESS', 'TEXAS' AS PROPERTY_STATE, ' ' AS PROPERTY_ZIPCODE FROM V_PROPERTYLOCATION WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(APPRAISAL_YR)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(APPRAISAL_YR, '|') END AS 'MOAPPRAISAL_YR', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_SEQ_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_SEQ_NUM, '|') END AS 'OWNER_SEQ_NUM', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNER_NAME)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNER_NAME, '|') END AS 'OWNER_NAME', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(OWNERSHIP_PCT)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(OWNERSHIP_PCT, '|') END AS 'OWNERSHIP_PCT', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM MULTI_OWNER WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?) ORDER BY OWNER_SEQ_NUM

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LEGAL1)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(LEGAL1, '|') END AS 'LEGAL1', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LEGAL2)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(LEGAL2, '|') END AS 'LEGAL2', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LEGAL3)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(LEGAL3, '|') END AS 'LEGAL3', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LEGAL4)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(LEGAL4, '|') END AS 'LEGAL4', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LEGAL5)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(LEGAL5, '|') END AS 'LEGAL5', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DEEDTRANSFERDATE, 101))) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DEEDTRANSFERDATE, 101), '|') END AS 'DEEDTRANSFERDATE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_LEGALDESCRIPTION WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(APPRAISAL_YR)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(APPRAISAL_YR, '|') END AS 'TVAPPRAISAL_YR', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(IMPR_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(IMPR_VAL, '0') END AS 'IMPR_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(LAND_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(LAND_VAL, '0') END AS 'LAND_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(TOT_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(TOT_VAL, '0') END AS 'TOT_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(REVALUATION_YR)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(REVALUATION_YR, '|') END AS 'REVALUATION_YR', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(PREVIOUSREVALUATIONYEAR)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PREVIOUSREVALUATIONYEAR, '|') END AS 'PREVIOUSREVALUATIONYEAR', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_TAXVALUE WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(DEPRECIATION_PCT)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DEPRECIATION_PCT, '|') END AS 'DEPRECIATION_PCT', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SAUNA_IND)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SAUNA_IND, '|') END AS 'SAUNA_IND', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(POOL_IND)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(POOL_IND, '|') END AS 'POOL_IND', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SPA_IND)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SPA_IND, '|') END AS 'SPA_IND', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(DECK_IND)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(DECK_IND, '|') END AS 'DECK_IND', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SPRINKLER_SYS_IND)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SPRINKLER_SYS_IND, '|') END AS 'SPRINKLER_SYS_IND', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_BEDROOMS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_BEDROOMS, '|') END AS 'NUM_BEDROOMS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_WET_BARS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_WET_BARS, '|') END AS 'NUM_WET_BARS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_HALF_BATHS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_HALF_BATHS, '|') END AS 'NUM_HALF_BATHS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_FULL_BATHS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_FULL_BATHS, '|') END AS 'NUM_FULL_BATHS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_KITCHENS)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_KITCHENS, '|') END AS 'NUM_KITCHENS', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_FIREPLACES)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_FIREPLACES, '|') END AS 'NUM_FIREPLACES', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ROOF_MAT_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ROOF_MAT_DESC, '|') END AS 'ROOF_MAT_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ROOF_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ROOF_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'ROOF_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(BASEMENT_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(BASEMENT_DESC, '|') END AS 'BASEMENT_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EXT_WALL_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(EXT_WALL_DESC, '|') END AS 'EXT_WALL_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(FENCE_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FENCE_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'FENCE_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(AC_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AC_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'AC_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HEATING_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(HEATING_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'HEATING_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(FOUNDATION_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FOUNDATION_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'FOUNDATION_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONSTR_FRAM_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONSTR_FRAM_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'CONSTR_FRAM_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(NUM_STORIES_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(NUM_STORIES_DESC, '|') END AS 'NUM_STORIES_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(PCT_COMPLETE)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(PCT_COMPLETE, '|') END AS 'PCT_COMPLETE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(TOT_LIVING_AREA_SF)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(TOT_LIVING_AREA_SF, '|') END AS 'TOT_LIVING_AREA_SF', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(TOT_MAIN_SF)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(TOT_MAIN_SF, '|') END AS 'TOT_MAIN_SF', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CDU_RATING_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CDU_RATING_DESC, '|') END AS 'CDU_RATING_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACT_AGE)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACT_AGE, '|') END AS 'ACT_AGE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EFF_YR_BUILT)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(EFF_YR_BUILT, '|') END AS 'EFF_YR_BUILT', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(YR_BUILT)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(YR_BUILT, '|') END AS 'YR_BUILT', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(BLDG_CLASS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(BLDG_CLASS_DESC, '|') END AS 'BLDG_CLASS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_MAINIMPROVEMENTS WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(AREA_SIZE)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(AREA_SIZE, '|') END AS 'AREA_SIZE', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(EXT_WALL_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(EXT_WALL_DESC, '|') END AS 'DEXT_WALL_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(FLOOR_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(FLOOR_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'FLOOR_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CONSTR_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CONSTR_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'CONSTR_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(IMPR_TYP_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(IMPR_TYP_DESC, '|') END AS 'IMPR_TYP_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SEQ_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SEQ_NUM, '|') END AS 'SEQ_NUM', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_ADDLIMPROVEMENTS WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT 'TAXING JURISDICTION' AS 'TJEXEMPDETAILLABEL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CITY_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(CITY_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'CITY_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SCHOOL_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SCHOOL_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'SCHOOL_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COUNTY_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(COUNTY_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'COUNTY_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COLLEGE_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(COLLEGE_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'COLLEGE_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HOSPITAL_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(HOSPITAL_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'HOSPITAL_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SPECIAL_DIST_JURIS_DESC)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(SPECIAL_DIST_JURIS_DESC, '|') END AS 'SPECIAL_DIST_JURIS_DESC', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_TAXEXEMPTION WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT EXEMPTION AS 'HEXEMPDETAILLABEL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CITY_APPLD_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(CITY_APPLD_VAL, '0') END AS 'CITY_APPLD_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISD_APPLD_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(ISD_APPLD_VAL, '0') END AS 'ISD_APPLD_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CNTY_APPLD_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(CNTY_APPLD_VAL, '0') END AS 'CNTY_APPLD_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COLLEGE_APPLD_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(COLLEGE_APPLD_VAL, '0') END AS 'COLLEGE_APPLD_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HOSPITAL_APPLD_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(HOSPITAL_APPLD_VAL, '0') END AS 'HOSPITAL_APPLD_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SPCL_APPLIED_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(SPCL_APPLIED_VAL, '0') END AS 'SPCL_APPLIED_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '0') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM ACCT_EXEMPT_VALUE WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT 'ESTIMATED TAXES' AS 'ETEXEMPDETAILLABEL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(REPLACE(CITY_TAXABLE_VAL,'.','') AS INT)*.007479)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(CITY_TAXABLE_VAL, '0'),'.','') AS INT)*.007479 END AS 'CITY_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(REPLACE(SCHOOL_JURIS_VAL,'.','') AS INT)*.01271343)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(SCHOOL_JURIS_VAL, '0'),'.','') AS INT)*.01271343 END AS 'SCHOOL_JURIS_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(REPLACE(COUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL,'.','') AS INT)*.00233312)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(COUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL, '0'),'.','') AS INT)*.00233312 END AS 'COUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(REPLACE(COLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL,'.','') AS INT)*.000949)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(COLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL, '0'),'.','') AS INT)*.000949 END AS 'COLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CAST(REPLACE(HOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL,'.','') AS INT)*.00274)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(HOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL, '0'),'.','') AS INT)*.00274 END AS 'HOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL', 'N/A' AS 'SPECIAL_DIST_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_TAXEXEMPTIONAMT WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT 'TAXABLE VALUE' AS 'TVEXEMPDETAILLABEL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CITY_TAXABLE_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(CITY_TAXABLE_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVCITY_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SCHOOL_JURIS_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(SCHOOL_JURIS_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVSCHOOL_JURIS_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(COUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVCOUNTY_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(COLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVCOLLEGE_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(HOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(HOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVHOSPITAL_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(SPECIAL_DIST_TAXABLE_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(SPECIAL_DIST_TAXABLE_VAL, '0') END AS 'TVSPECIAL_DIST_TAXABLE_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '|') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM V_TAXEXEMPTIONAMT WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)

dataquery.name: Content
dataquery.sql: SELECT 'TAX CEILING' AS 'TCEXEMPDETAILLABEL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(CITY_CEIL_TAX_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(CITY_CEIL_TAX_VAL, '0') END AS 'CITY_CEIL_TAX_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISD_CEIL_TAX_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(ISD_CEIL_TAX_VAL, '0') END AS 'ISD_CEIL_TAX_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COUNTY_CEIL_TAX_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(COUNTY_CEIL_TAX_VAL, '0') END AS 'COUNTY_CEIL_TAX_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(COLLEGE_CEIL_TAX_VAL)) = '' THEN '0' ELSE ISNULL(COLLEGE_CEIL_TAX_VAL, '0') END AS 'COLLEGE_CEIL_TAX_VAL', 'N/A' AS 'HOSPITAL_CEIL_TAX_VAL', 'N/A' AS 'SPECIAL_CEIL_TAX_VAL', CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ACCOUNT_NUM)) = '' THEN '|' ELSE ISNULL(ACCOUNT_NUM, '0') END AS 'MAINACCOUNT_NUM' FROM APPLIED_STD_EXEMPT WHERE ACCOUNT_NUM IN (?)
